name: Clinkz
title: Bone Fletcher
lore: At the crossing of Bleeding Hills, a demon and a great wizard battled. Clinkz, an archer, slew the demon but was cursed to burn eternally.

strafeFire.name: Strafe
strafeFire.description: Clinkz gains a rapid burst of attack speed and attack damage for a short duration.

searingArrows.name: Searing Arrows
searingArrows.description: Imbues arrows with fire, dealing bonus damage to targets.

deathPact.name: Death Pact
deathPact.description: Clinkz consumes a target creep, gaining bonus HP and damage based on its health.

burningBarrage.name: Burning Barrage
burningBarrage.description: Channels to fire a volley of arrows in a direction, dealing attack damage plus bonus.
